document.title: Pellete de liens du 15-06-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
KnoWare, Inc. - Award Winning Internet Utilities and Software Since 1996! Internet Neighborhood Pro, the world's most popular FTP client for Windows Explorer, gives you the ability to connect to FTP servers through the familiar WIndows Explorer interface. (Tags: windows network soft ftp storage )
RoamDrive (beta) Use GMail as an online storage unit. (Tags: gmail windows soft storage )
PEAR::Flickr_API une classe php (Pear) pour interroger l'api flickr (Tags: photo php dev flickr classe php.lib )
99ROOMS.COM Very nice point-and-click adventure in Flash. (Tags: flash jeu )
XFN - XHTML Friends Network XFN (XHTML Friends Network) is a simple way to represent human relationships using hyperlinks. In recent years, blogs and blogrolls have become the fastest growing area of the Web. (Tags: xhtml network community )
LXer: Ubuntu Linux Desktop Reviewed "My first exposure to Ubuntu Linux occurred on forums, mailing lists and in the press. Friends told me that a great deal of hype existed around the distribution. I saw some criticism saying that Ubuntu was just another flavor of Debian. So, I basically dismissed it from the list of distributions I test. After all, we have seen new distributions of Linux crop up and die rather quickly." (Tags: libre review linux ubuntu )
Bulletin hebdomadaire allergo-pollinique de Paris AIRPARIF - Pollens - Surveillance des pollens dans l'air (Tags: paris health allergie )
Equivalent javascript des proprietes de CSS - Tellaw.org Voici une liste assez complete des equivalents entre les appels javascript et les proprietes de CSS. (Tags: javascript css )
resources.neolao.com/flash/classes Classes AS2 de NeoLao. (Tags: flash dev actionscript flash.lib )
resources.neolao.com/php/classes Classes PHP de NeoLao. (Tags: php dev classe php.lib )
Upload files to your mobile phone - Free file upload service on wap - mobstorage.com 1. Upload your file 2. Get the item code 3. Go to wap.mobstorage.com and download (Tags: storage mobility online.tools )
CoolMon - system stats on your desktop CoolMon is a program for monitoring vital system stats and almost anything else you wish to display on the desktop. (Tags: windows soft monitoring )
foobar2000 Foobar2000 is an advanced audio player for the Windows platform. Some of the basic features include ReplayGain support, low memory footprint and native support for several popular audio formats. (Tags: musique windows son soft player )
Article : Jabber, une autre facon de voir l'IM Nee de l'Internet Relay Chat (IRC), la messagerie instantanee ne cesse de se developper avec les annees et voit les naissances de MSN, Yahoo! Messenger, AIM et... Jabber. (Tags: jabber messenger )
Upload and crop your photos, web graphics, Skype / MSN / Yahoo avatars. No more Photoshop! Upload and crop your photos, web graphics, Skype / MSN / Yahoo avatars and much more. Forget Photoshop! (Tags: photo online.tools )
01net. - Les escrocs se mettent a la prise de fichiers en otage Certains de vos fichiers sont codes. Pour acheter le decodeur, envoyez un mail a [...] . C'est le message que PGPCoder laisse sur les PC de ses victimes afin de tenter de leur extorquer de l'argent. (Tags: hack malware )
